result.execSummary:
The defendant William R. Boutin Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: Repeater], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: No contact with S.F., K.R., & J.K. unless approved by agent.

Counseling as deemed appropriate by dept.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 3:06 pm 
INCLUDES 15CF505, 15CM1076, AND 15CM1349. 
State appears by ADA Mike Puerner; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Austin Mort.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 

State moves to: 
In 15CF505: Ct. 2 (Burglary - Building or Dwelling/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Theft/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Theft/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1349: Ct. 1 (Receiving or Concealing Stolen Property/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CF505: Ct. 1 (Burglary - Building or Dwelling/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CM1076: Ct. 1 (Criminal Damage to Property/Repeater/DA)>>NO CONTEST. 
                       : Ct. 2 (DC/Repeater/DA)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: In 15CF505: Ct. 1>>6 years and 6 months imprisonment - 2 years and 6 months IC and 4 years ES - CONDITIONS of ES: No contact with S.F., K.R., and J.K. unless approved by agent; counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; fulltime employment/schooling; DNA sample and surcharge; CC. 
                           : In 15CM1076: Ct. 1>>100 days MCJ and CC. 
                                                    : Ct. 2>>100 days MCJ and CC. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to 99 days jail credit on all. 
COURT finds the def eligible for CIP and SAP in 15CF505. 

Adj: 3:27 pm
